verses.verse: And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Go <S%H935><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, Let my people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>, that they may serve me <S%H5647><s%>.
And if you refuse <S%H3986><s%> to let them go <S%H7971><s%>, behold <S%H5062><s%>, I will strike all your borders <S%H1366><s%> with frogs <S%H6854><s%>:

And the river <S%H2975><s%> shall bring forth <S%H8317><s%> frogs <S%H6854><s%> abundantly <S%H8317><s%>, which shall go up <S%H5927><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> into your house <S%H1004><s%>, and into your bedroom <S%H2315><s%>, and upon your bed <S%H4296><s%>, and into the house <S%H1004><s%> of your servants <S%H5650><s%>, and upon your people <S%H5971><s%>, and into your ovens <S%H8574><s%>, and into your kneadingtroughs <S%H4863><s%>:
And the frogs <S%H6854><s%> shall come up <S%H5927><s%> both on you and upon your people <S%H5971><s%>, and upon all your servants <S%H5650><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Say <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Stretch forth <S%H5186><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> with your rod <S%H4294><s%> over the streams <S%H5104><s%>, over the rivers <S%H2975><s%>, and over the ponds <S%H98><s%>, and cause frogs <S%H6854><s%> to come up <S%H5927><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> stretched out <S%H5186><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> over the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and the frogs <S%H6854><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%>, and covered <S%H3680><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
And the magicians <S%H2748><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so with their enchantments <S%H3909><s%>, and brought up <S%H5927><s%> frogs <S%H6854><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, entreat <S%H6279><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, that he may take away <S%H5493><s%> the frogs <S%H6854><s%> from me <S%H5971><s%>, and from my people; and I will let the people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>, that they may do sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, Glory <S%H6286><s%> over me <S%H4970><s%>: when shall I entreat <S%H6279><s%> for you and for your servants <S%H5650><s%>, and for your people <S%H5971><s%>, to destroy <S%H3772><s%> the frogs <S%H6854><s%> from you and your houses <S%H1004><s%>, that they may remain <S%H7604><s%> in the river only <S%H2975><s%>?

And he said <S%H559><s%>, To morrow <S%H4279><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%>, Be it according to your word <S%H1697><s%>: that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that there is none like unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>.

And the frogs <S%H6854><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%> from you and from your houses <S%H1004><s%>, and from your servants <S%H5650><s%>, and from your people <S%H5971><s%>; they shall remain <S%H7604><s%> in the river only <S%H2975><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>: and Moses <S%H4872><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> because of <S%H1697><s%> the frogs <S%H6854><s%> which he had brought <S%H7760><s%> against Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>; and the frogs <S%H6854><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> out of the houses <S%H1004><s%>, out of the villages <S%H2691><s%>, and out of the fields <S%H7704><s%>.
And they gathered them together <S%H6651><s%> upon heaps <S%H2563><s%>: and the land <S%H776><s%> stank <S%H887><s%>.

But when Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that there was respite <S%H7309><s%>, he hardened <S%H3513><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%>, and listened <S%H8085><s%> not unto them <S%H3068><s%>; as the Lord had said <S%H1696><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Say <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Stretch out <S%H5186><s%> your rod <S%H4294><s%>, and strike <S%H5221><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, that it may become lice <S%H3654><s%> throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And they did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H175><s%>; for Aaron stretched out <S%H5186><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> with his rod <S%H4294><s%>, and struck <S%H5221><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and it became lice <S%H3654><s%> in man <S%H120><s%>, and in animal <S%H929><s%>; all the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> became lice <S%H3654><s%> throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And the magicians <S%H2748><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so with their enchantments <S%H3909><s%> to bring forth <S%H3318><s%> lice <S%H3654><s%>, but they could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3654><s%>: so there were lice upon man <S%H120><s%>, and upon animal <S%H929><s%>.

Then the magicians <S%H2748><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, This is the finger <S%H676><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>: and Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%> was hardened <S%H2388><s%>, and he listened <S%H8085><s%> not unto them <S%H3068><s%>; as the Lord had said <S%H1696><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Rise up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>; behold he comes forth <S%H3318><s%> to the water <S%H4325><s%>; and say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, Thus says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, Let my people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>, that they may serve me <S%H5647><s%>.

Else <S%H5971><s%>, if you will not let my people go <S%H7971><s%>, behold <S%H7971><s%>, I will send swarms <S%H6157><s%> of flies upon you and upon your servants <S%H5650><s%>, and upon your people <S%H5971><s%>, and into your houses <S%H1004><s%>: and the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall be full <S%H4390><s%> of swarms <S%H6157><s%> of flies <S%H127><s%>, and also the ground whereon they are.

And I will sever <S%H6395><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%>, in which my people <S%H5971><s%> live <S%H5975><s%>, that no <S%H1115><s%> swarms <S%H6157><s%> of flies shall be <S%H1961><s%> there <S%H4616><s%>; to the end you may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
And I will put <S%H7760><s%> a division <S%H6304><s%> between my people <S%H5971><s%> and your people <S%H5971><s%>: to morrow <S%H4279><s%> shall this sign be <S%H226><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H935><s%>; and there came a severe <S%H3515><s%> swarm <S%H6157><s%> of flies into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and into his servants <S%H5650><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>, and into all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: the land <S%H776><s%> was corrupted <S%H7843><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of the swarm of flies <S%H6157><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and for Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> you sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to your God <S%H430><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, It is not worthy <S%H3559><s%> so to do <S%H6213><s%>; for <S%H2005><s%> we shall sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the abomination <S%H8441><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>: behold shall we sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> the abomination <S%H8441><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> before their eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and will they not stone us <S%H5619><s%>?

We will go <S%H3212><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>' journey <S%H1870><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, as he shall command us <S%H559><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, I will let you go <S%H7971><s%>, that you may sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>; only you shall not go <S%H3212><s%> very <S%H7368><s%> far away <S%H7368><s%>: entreat <S%H6279><s%> for me <S%H1157><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H3318><s%>, I go out from you and I will entreat <S%H6279><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> that the swarms <S%H6157><s%> of flies may depart <S%H5493><s%> from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, from his servants <S%H5650><s%>, and from his people <S%H5971><s%>, to morrow <S%H4279><s%>: but <S%H7535><s%> let not Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> deal deceitfully <S%H2048><s%> any more <S%H3254><s%> in not <S%H1115><s%> letting the people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> to sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and entreated <S%H6279><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>; and he removed <S%H5493><s%> the swarms <S%H6157><s%> of flies from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, from his servants <S%H5650><s%>, and from his people <S%H5971><s%>; there remained <S%H7604><s%> not one <S%H259><s%>.
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> hardened <S%H3513><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%> at this time <S%H6471><s%> also <S%H5971><s%>, neither would he let the people go <S%H7971><s%>.
